description: This simple brussels sprout side dish is the perfect blend of sweet and savoury flavours.
name: Sauteed Brussels Sprouts with Sultanas & Shallots Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a drizzle of the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the shallots for 6-7 minutes. Stir in the garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Tip in the sultanas, honey and balsamic vinegar and reduce the heat to low. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring.

Cook the brussels sprouts in a large pan of salted water for 5 minutes, or until tender. Drain well and tip into the shallot mix. Toss well to coat and cook on medium heat for 2 minutes, adding a little water if necessary.
Serve with flaked almonds on top.
